articles.description: England captain Jos Buttler questions whether the "poor" outfield in Dharamshala impacts the integrity of Tuesday's World Cup match against Bangladesh.
articles.title: Buttler questions 'poor' Dharamshala outfield

articles.description: The FIA says it will look into calendar changes and other measures in Formula 1 to deal with extreme weather following the Qatar Grand Prix.
articles.title: FIA to look at F1 calendar changes after Qatar GP

articles.description: England back Marcus Smith has praised the role of Olympic great Daley Thompson in developing his speed.
articles.title: Smith improving speed with help from Olympic great

articles.description: New Zealand continue their unbeaten start to the Men's Cricket World Cup with a dominant 99-run win over the Netherlands in Hyderabad.
articles.title: New Zealand comfortably beat Netherlands in World Cup

articles.description: Trent Boult takes an "absolutely spectacular" acrobatic catch for New Zealand to dismiss Netherlands batter Bos de Leede at the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: Boult takes 'absolutely spectacular catch' for New Zealand

articles.description: Coco Gauff and Iga Swiatek will both miss next month’s Billie Jean King Cup finals, which start two days after the WTA Finals finish in Mexico.
articles.title: Gauff & Swiatek to miss Billie Jean King Cup finals

articles.description: With Patrick Cantlay's decision to not wear a hat at the Ryder Cup still making headlines, BBC Sport's Iain Carter looks at the thorny issue of pay for players.
articles.title: 'Hat-gate' prompts question of pay at Ryder Cup

articles.description: Promoter Eddie Hearn says his "intention" is to make a Conor Benn v Chris Eubank fight happen in December.
articles.title: Hearn seeks Benn-Eubank date with Joshua on bill

articles.description: Arsenal forward Bukayo Saka is ruled out of England's games against Australia and Italy because of injury.
articles.title: Saka ruled out for England through injury

articles.description: Cricket could be in the Olympics for the first time since 1900 as organisers recommend it to be part of the 2028 Los Angeles Games.
articles.title: Cricket recommended for 2028 LA Olympics spot
